TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Pu-yi-nuo-se-ay-li-se, title = Pu-yi-nuo-se-ay-li-se, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pu-yi-nuo-se-ay-li-se} }

S.FORM: == Pu-yi-nuo-se-ay-li-se 布宜諾斯艾利斯 == A-ken-ten u A-ken-ten a suo-tu atu satabaikay nu tukayan, itida i La-pu-la-ta sauwac nu tipan a dadipasan, Na-min-cuo wali timul a dadipasan, nu ayawan u U-la-kuy Walian. Pu-se u malaA-ken-ten a tusa a bataan idaw ku sepat nu niyadu'an. pulung nu tukay mala sabaw tu lima a niyadu'an pulung han makaala tu sepat a bataan idaw ku walu a adidiay nu niyadu'an. 48個小區. ngangan 名稱 nina tukay kalawlawan tu lingatu, Si-pan-ya mitahaway a tademaw ci Pei-de-luo.Men-duo-sa mangalay mikining ci Ma-liyaan " Mem-cuo katuuday a Si-pan-ya mitahaway a niyadu'an ci An-ta-lu-si-ya atu Ti-cung-hay kanatal a pabalungaay a tademaw midiput tu i Pu-yi-ay-li a ci Ma-li-yaan, "Pu-yi-ay-li" itida i Si-pan-ya nakamuan u "bangcalay a hanhanan" a imian. itida i caylutusip mihcaan atu caylutunem mihcaan, tawya Si-pan-ya La-kan-wankuo nu lalaan misaahebal katukuh i Sa-tin-ni-ya subal atu nutipan a Yi-ta-li, Si-pan-ya lawaen ku Sa-tin-ni-ya subal a tukay Ka-li-ya-li, patideng tu adidiay nu buyuan atu patideng tu luma' atu kiwkay, u nikapah nu bali itini sa. . sakamusa tu nika cacay a malebut tulu a lasubu pitu a bataan nu mihcaan nika tabakian nu bali, maadih nu binacadan ku sasing ni Ma-li-ya i bayubayuan. ina sasing padeng han i siwtawyen, masikad ku Si-pan-ya pacunaay tu balungan a tademaw, hina inuli ku pabalungaay a tademaw pakakapahen ku kainai' nu cakep, liyasen ku labades. 傳說在1370 . likisi 歷史 sakinacacay a mabulaw 第一次移民潮 caywallimsip mihcaan Pu-yi-nuo-se-ay-li-se hulic a wayway, caywaltusep katukuh caywalwalsep mihcaan mahida misitekeday a kanatalan ku Pu-yi-nuo-se-ay-li-se. caylimcaynem mihcaan Si-pan-ya mitahaway a pabalungaay a tademaw ci Hu-an.Di-ya-se.D.Suo-li-se, u sayaway a makatukuhay i La-pu-la-ta sauwac a O-cuo atdemaw, litawalan nu W-la-kuy a tademaw mapatay. caylimlutu mihcaan tusa a bulad tusa a demiad, ci Pei-de-luo. Men-duo-sa mililid tu Si-pan-ya a tademaw sayaway u ngnngan nu Pu-yi-nuo-se-ay-li-se ku ngangan, ina kitidaan a tukay nu aydaay a Pu-nuo-se-ay-li-se tatelungan a timulan nu niyadu'an. caylimsipcay sademiad han sawacuen nu makatalay a tademaw, nu muenengay itida a tademaw laliw satu mabulaw tayda i nu dumaan a niyadu'an. 1516 . sakinatusa a mabulaw 第二次移民潮 caylimwalsep mihcaan, ci Hu-an. De.Cya-lei namaka Pa-la-kuy tukay Ya-sun-sen duducen nida ku nanum a makatuku, malingatu tu sakatusa a mabulaw katukuh ayda ku nieneng. amica u baluhay ku nipatidengan tu tukay u " cacay nu matuluay" ku nganganan nu tukay, minatu a ngangan u Pu-yi-nuo-se-ay-li-se, aydaay nu pinganganan nu minatu. 1580年, . kabulawan a zitay 殖民時期 Pu-yi-nuo-se-ay-li-se sayaway u nipisiwbay ku kawaw, sabaw pitu katukuh i sabaw walu nu seci tu hatidaay a mihcaan, Si-pan-ya mabulaway a tademaw misaicelang miyukiw tu O-cuo nu sasiwbayan kanca a mitui tu Min-lu-li-ma, a lidamsuan , uyni a kiyaku micidek pala'cus tu Pu-yi-nuo-se-ay-li-se sapisiwbayan a nikaidaan, sisa mapalekal ku sapiubiaw a kakelidan tu cancanan a kawawan, tawya idaw ku nipatideng tu sapiada tu Si-pan-ya a tademawan. . patunaan 血統 hatidaay nu binacadan nu O-cuo a papunaan, u dayday nu Si-pan-ya atu Yi-ta-li u binacadan namin. duma nu O-cuo pasu De-kuo,Ay-e-lan,Pu-taw-ya, Fa-kuo,Ke'-luo-ay-si-ya, Ing-ke-lan,Wi-e-se, itida i caysiwsiwsep mihcaan idaw ku namaka E-luo-se atu W-ke'-lan mabulaway a binacadan. pinaay kiya ku Si-pan-ya atu kalamelan nu itidaany a tademaw nu ilucan, tademaw namaka taydaan nu Si-pan-ya haymawsa macunus, tusep a secian nu lingatu Siu-li-ya atu Ya-men-ni-ya binacadan i sakay siwbayan idaw ku sakalalidan. . Di-pun sayaway nikabulawan i Pu-yi-nuo-se-ay-li-se a binacadan, tapang namaka Ukinawa, kalaylayan nu Di-pun tayda i A-ken-ten nganganan u papaluma tu balu, mikikaka tu mibacaay, iluc han malahat ku sakaudip nu heni, caysiwpicsep mihcaan, Cung-kuo atu Han-kuo tademaw mala mabulaway a tapang, Han-kuo u misiwbayay ku katuud. Pu-yi-nuo-se-ay-li-se caay kaw A-ken-ten a tatelungan nu sihu, u sakaudip, ke-ci, lalangwan atu ciciduysyaan. Lalabu nu tukay idaw ku walu a wangan nu kakakulian, ya kakakulian makaala tu makatulu nu tusaay, i sakaudip han tada u angangangan. tukay a Ay-say-sa pahikukian u tuud nida u sakapay, papabalungaan makaala tu lima a cuoan. saka tahekalan nu tuudan makaala tu luwal %, tayniay i labu nu minatuan makaala tu limsiw %. idaw ku siwa a silamalay tayda tu kitakidan, ilabu nu kanatal idaw ku enemay a ti-tean. ,市內有6條地鐵. lalangawan 文化 tatelungan nu Ci-si-na a lalangawan, idaw ku nipatideng tu Pu-yi-nuo-se-ay-li-se yiwbin, u satabakiay nu La-tin-min-cuo nu tatelungan a lalangawan. Pu-yi-nuo-se-ay-li-se malalid nu pihacengay nu O-cuo a lalangawan, panganganan han tu " Nan-min a pa-li". tidaay a niyadu'an makaala tu cacay a bataan nu pina a gagikian, atu La-tin-min-cuo sakanai' nu lawadan a gagikian nu kawawan. tatengan, tu payduyuduyu, ninatukay hakiya makaala tu tulu a lasubu nu lalumaan a gagikian tu sapakaadih tu binawlan , mahiniay a sasulitan i kitakid u sakacacay ku ngangan, hakiya milawit tu Lun-tun,Niw-ye atu Pa-li nina lalangawan a tataynian. milakiuyt tu cacay a bataan a kitidaan atu lima a mihcaan nu likisi a sasulitan tu sakatusa a nikasinganganan, mikilul tu Ay-tin-paw. Ci-si-na tatelungan nu lalangawan, patideng i Pu-yi-nuo-se-ay-li-se cung-yeng-yubinkiwk, u satabakiay nu La-tin-min-cuo a tatelungan a lalangawan, itini i kitakid tu sakatulu a kasinganganan nu tatelungan a lalangawan. . nicuda 文學 Pu-yi-nuo-se-ay-li-se hatidaay tu nu tenes saan u La-tin-men-cuo atu Si-pan-ya kitakid a natangahan atu nicudadaan a tukay sa. amica ku Pu-yi-nuo-se-ay-li-se a tukay nu likisi apuyu', nika idaw ku sakahemekan nu nicudadan. itini i sabaw siwa a seci tu hedek atu tusa a bataan nu lingatu a seci, lalangawan mikilul tu nikalahat nu nikaudipan, ina tukay malanicudadan a tukay atu Na-min satabakiay nu papatahekalan tu cudan a kitidaan, "amica ku caay kaw nikakapah nu sakaudip a dadan, hucu nu A-ken-tan a tademaw kanca mananam tu miadih tu cudad. ."

== Po-yi-noo-se-ay-li-se 布宜諾斯艾利斯 == A-ken-ten o A-ken-ten a soo-to ato satabaikay no tokayan, itida i La-po-la-ta saowac no tipan a dadipasan, Na-min-coo wali timol a dadipasan, no ayawan o U-la-koy Walian. Po-se o malaA-ken-ten a tosa a bataan idaw ko sepat no niyado'an. polong no tokay mala sabaw to lima a niyado'an polong han makaala to sepat a bataan idaw ko walo a adidiay no niyado'an. 48個小區. ngangan 名稱 nina tokay kalawlawan to lingato, Si-pan-ya mitahaway a tademaw ci Pei-de-loo.Men-doo-sa mangalay mikining ci Ma-liyaan " Mem-coo katooday a Si-pan-ya mitahaway a niyado'an ci An-ta-lo-si-ya ato Ti-cong-hay kanatal a pabalongaay a tademaw midipot to i Po-yi-ay-li a ci Ma-li-yaan, "Po-yi-ay-li" itida i Si-pan-ya nakamoan o "bangcalay a hanhanan" a imian. itida i caylotosip mihcaan ato caylotonem mihcaan, tawya Si-pan-ya La-kan-wankoo no lalaan misaahebal katokoh i Sa-tin-ni-ya sobal ato notipan a Yi-ta-li, Si-pan-ya lawaen ko Sa-tin-ni-ya sobal a tokay Ka-li-ya-li, patideng to adidiay no boyoan ato patideng to loma' ato kiwkay, o nikapah no bali itini sa. . sakamosa to nika cacay a malebot tolo a lasobo pito a bataan no mihcaan nika tabakian no bali, maadih no binacadan ko sasing ni Ma-li-ya i bayobayoan. ina sasing padeng han i siwtawyen, masikad ko Si-pan-ya paconaay to balongan a tademaw, hina inoli ko pabalongaay a tademaw pakakapahen ko kainai' no cakep, liyasen ko labades. 傳說在1370 . likisi 歷史 sakinacacay a mabolaw 第一次移民潮 caywallimsip mihcaan Po-yi-noo-se-ay-li-se holic a wayway, caywaltosep katokoh caywalwalsep mihcaan mahida misitekeday a kanatalan ko Po-yi-noo-se-ay-li-se. caylimcaynem mihcaan Si-pan-ya mitahaway a pabalongaay a tademaw ci Ho-an.Di-ya-se.D.Soo-li-se, o sayaway a makatokohay i La-po-la-ta saowac a O-coo atdemaw, litawalan no W-la-koy a tademaw mapatay. caylimloto mihcaan tosa a bolad tosa a demiad, ci Pei-de-loo. Men-doo-sa mililid to Si-pan-ya a tademaw sayaway o ngnngan no Po-yi-noo-se-ay-li-se ko ngangan, ina kitidaan a tokay no aydaay a Po-noo-se-ay-li-se tatelongan a timolan no niyado'an. caylimsipcay sademiad han sawacoen no makatalay a tademaw, no moenengay itida a tademaw laliw sato mabolaw tayda i no domaan a niyado'an. 1516 . sakinatosa a mabolaw 第二次移民潮 caylimwalsep mihcaan, ci Ho-an. De.Cya-lei namaka Pa-la-koy tokay Ya-son-sen dodocen nida ko nanom a makatoko, malingato to sakatosa a mabolaw katokoh ayda ko nieneng. amica o balohay ko nipatidengan to tokay o " cacay no matoloay" ko nganganan no tokay, minato a ngangan o Po-yi-noo-se-ay-li-se, aydaay no pinganganan no minato. 1580年, . kabolawan a zitay 殖民時期 Po-yi-noo-se-ay-li-se sayaway o nipisiwbay ko kawaw, sabaw pito katokoh i sabaw walo no seci to hatidaay a mihcaan, Si-pan-ya mabolaway a tademaw misaicelang miyokiw to O-coo no sasiwbayan kanca a mitoi to Min-lo-li-ma, a lidamsoan , oyni a kiyako micidek pala'cos to Po-yi-noo-se-ay-li-se sapisiwbayan a nikaidaan, sisa mapalekal ko sapiobiaw a kakelidan to cancanan a kawawan, tawya idaw ko nipatideng to sapiada to Si-pan-ya a tademawan. . patonaan 血統 hatidaay no binacadan no O-coo a paponaan, o dayday no Si-pan-ya ato Yi-ta-li o binacadan namin. doma no O-coo paso De-koo,Ay-e-lan,Po-taw-ya, Fa-koo,Ke'-loo-ay-si-ya, Ing-ke-lan,Wi-e-se, itida i caysiwsiwsep mihcaan idaw ko namaka E-loo-se ato W-ke'-lan mabolaway a binacadan. pinaay kiya ko Si-pan-ya ato kalamelan no itidaany a tademaw no ilocan, tademaw namaka taydaan no Si-pan-ya haymawsa maconos, tosep a secian no lingato Sio-li-ya ato Ya-men-ni-ya binacadan i sakay siwbayan idaw ko sakalalidan. . Di-pon sayaway nikabolawan i Po-yi-noo-se-ay-li-se a binacadan, tapang namaka Ukinawa, kalaylayan no Di-pon tayda i A-ken-ten nganganan o papaloma to balo, mikikaka to mibacaay, iloc han malahat ko sakaodip no heni, caysiwpicsep mihcaan, Cong-koo ato Han-koo tademaw mala mabolaway a tapang, Han-koo o misiwbayay ko katood. Po-yi-noo-se-ay-li-se caay kaw A-ken-ten a tatelongan no siho, o sakaodip, ke-ci, lalangwan ato cicidoysyaan. Lalabo no tokay idaw ko walo a wangan no kakakolian, ya kakakolian makaala to makatolo no tosaay, i sakaodip han tada o angangangan. tokay a Ay-say-sa pahikokian o tood nida o sakapay, papabalongaan makaala to lima a cooan. saka tahekalan no toodan makaala to lowal %, tayniay i labo no minatoan makaala to limsiw %. idaw ko siwa a silamalay tayda to kitakidan, ilabo no kanatal idaw ko enemay a ti-tean. ,市內有6條地鐵. lalangawan 文化 tatelongan no Ci-si-na a lalangawan, idaw ko nipatideng to Po-yi-noo-se-ay-li-se yiwbin, o satabakiay no La-tin-min-coo no tatelongan a lalangawan. Po-yi-noo-se-ay-li-se malalid no pihacengay no O-coo a lalangawan, panganganan han to " Nan-min a pa-li". tidaay a niyado'an makaala to cacay a bataan no pina a gagikian, ato La-tin-min-coo sakanai' no lawadan a gagikian no kawawan. tatengan, to paydoyodoyo, ninatokay hakiya makaala to tolo a lasobo no lalomaan a gagikian to sapakaadih to binawlan , mahiniay a sasolitan i kitakid o sakacacay ko ngangan, hakiya milawit to Lon-ton,Niw-ye ato Pa-li nina lalangawan a tataynian. milakioyt to cacay a bataan a kitidaan ato lima a mihcaan no likisi a sasolitan to sakatosa a nikasinganganan, mikilol to Ay-tin-paw. Ci-si-na tatelongan no lalangawan, patideng i Po-yi-noo-se-ay-li-se cong-yeng-yobinkiwk, o satabakiay no La-tin-min-coo a tatelongan a lalangawan, itini i kitakid to sakatolo a kasinganganan no tatelongan a lalangawan. . nicoda 文學 Po-yi-noo-se-ay-li-se hatidaay to no tenes saan o La-tin-men-coo ato Si-pan-ya kitakid a natangahan ato nicodadaan a tokay sa. amica ko Po-yi-noo-se-ay-li-se a tokay no likisi apoyo', nika idaw ko sakahemekan no nicodadan. itini i sabaw siwa a seci to hedek ato tosa a bataan no lingato a seci, lalangawan mikilol to nikalahat no nikaodipan, ina tokay malanicodadan a tokay ato Na-min satabakiay no papatahekalan to codan a kitidaan, "amica ko caay kaw nikakapah no sakaodip a dadan, hoco no A-ken-tan a tademaw kanca mananam to miadih to codad. ."
